author: remm
msg: - Consider all session ids sent as cookies until one is valid.
- Fix bug 26492 (which likely has duplicates in 4.1.x land).
- Controvertial change: don't create cookie objects from sessionId cookies.
Since we're hiding the sessionId from the URL, it IMO should be the same with
cookies. This is faster and IMO cleaner.

author: luehe
msg: Ignore setBufferSize()/setLocale() calls on included response

author: remm
msg: - Bug 26373: Initialize mapper before load on startup servlets.

author: remm
msg: - Add support for liking to user transactions.
